title: Security misconfiguration
content:
Description :
When we request a magic link to login into the application, and use that same link in multiple browsers, it working there isn't any limit on use of link.
Steps to reproduce :
go to app.lemilist.com
create a magic link
use it to login
now open another browser or incognito window
use that same magic link
And You'll be logged in in your account.
Impact
If Attacker gets the magic link of user he can login into victim's account.
Account takeover.
Mitigation :
Add a limit to magic link and remove the magic link from database after 1 use.
only allow the Requester IP to login using the magic link.
steps: Go to app.lemilist.com and create a magic link for login.
Use the same magic link in another browser or incognito window to login again.
vuln_description: The magic link for login can be used multiple times in different browsers or sessions, allowing an attacker to gain unauthorized access if they obtain the link.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to discover as it only requires testing the reusability of the magic link in different contexts, without any complex interactions or state manipulations.
